Articles.Content:
I know that Raptor9 quit KSP, but I don't know why the craft post has been edited to remove the pictures and links. The crafts on KerbalX have also been removed. I assume that Raptor9 did not want the crafts public, but I have no idea why.

I would also be really happy if someone has archives of the images or craft files.

I hope that i can get some explanations

On 1/6/2024 at 8:14 AM, KewlGuy said:

I would also be really happy if someone has archives of the images or craft files.

If anyone has copies they should not share them. It's Raptor9's work and up to Raptor9 if such things are shared. Raptor9 deleting everything speaks volumes and makes it clear that they don't want things shared.

AFAIK Raptor9 does not want to disclose why they took such action. People are allowed to move on, lose interest in KSP, ragequit, accept a paid offer to use work elsewhere, retract because they violated someone else's copyright, and/or any other reason without having to publicly justify why they are doing so.

On 1/17/2024 at 4:33 PM, DeadJohn said:

AFAIK Raptor9 does not want to disclose why they took such action. People are allowed to move on, lose interest in KSP, ragequit, accept a paid offer to use work elsewhere, retract because they violated someone else's copyright, and/or any other reason without having to publicly justify why they are doing so.

I think KSP shot his Pa and stole his woman...

Edited February 5 by Mahnarch
